      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Checks user existing.
      boolean QuestionService.changeAppealStatus(long userId, long questionId, boolean isOnAppeal, boolean isAnswered)

      Changes user data.

      Writes user answer in database.
      long QuestionService.countActiveQuestionsAmount(long userId)
      Calculates amount of all active questions that not played for concrete user.
      long ArticleService.countArticlesAmount()
      Counts existing articles amount.
      boolean QuestionService.createQuestion(Question question)
      Creates new Question in database.
      java.util.List<User> UserService.findAllUsers()
      Returns all existing users.
      java.util.Optional<Article> ArticleService.findArticle(long articleId)
      Returns Article by articleId.
      java.util.List<Article> ArticleService.findArticlesByParts(long amount, long offset, java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,User> authors)
      Returns limited number of articles.
      java.util.List<Question> QuestionService.findNonActiveQuestions()
      Returns a list of Questions in witch isActive = false
      java.util.List<Question> QuestionService.findQuestionsByParts(long userId, long amount, long offset, java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,User> authors)
      Returns a list of Questions selected from given position and with limited size.
      java.util.List<PlayedQuestion> QuestionService.findQuestionsOnAppeal()
      Returns a list of PlayedQuestions in witch isOnAppeal = true
      java.util.Optional<UserData> UserService.findUserData(long userId)
      Returns UserData by user ID.
      long UserService.increaseRating(long userId)
      Increases user rating on constant.
      void QuestionService.processQuestion(Question question)
      Deletes question or makes it active.
      boolean UserService.registryUser(User user, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String confirmPassword)
      Creates new User in database.
      boolean UserService.removeRating(long userId)
      Makes user rating equals 0.
      boolean UserService.updateImage(User user, javax.servlet.http.Part part)
      Updates user image and returns true if the image was changed.
